data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Kohei Isa (Oita) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 4, Oita takes a corner from the left.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai drives forward and Takuma Hamasaki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 8, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Oita are pushing forward but Ryosuke Maeda's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Oita needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
In the minute 20, Oita are coming forward and Yamato Machida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Goal kick for Oita at Yurtec Stadium.
Oita's Kohei Isa has run offside.
In the minute 28, Yuto Misao of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In the minute 32, Oita takes a corner from the right.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 34, Kazushi Mitsuhira puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Yuto Misao to set up the goal.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Oita pushes forward through Yuki Kagawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 40, Free kick Sendai.
Sendai make their first substitution with Kunimitsu Sekiguchi replacing Ryo Germain.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Sendai.
Sendai's Kunimitsu Sekiguchi is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 42, Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Sendai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Oita to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Sendai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Sendai are pushing forward but Shun Nagasawa's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Sendai's Keiya Shiihashi misses with an attempt on goal.
Oita have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
In the minute 56, Oita needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Oita at Yurtec Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Sendai.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Takahiro Yanagi (Sendai) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Takuma Nishimura is on a sub for Takayoshi Ishihara for Sendai.
Shingo Hyodo is replacing Keiya Shiihashi for the home team.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Oita.
In the minute 63, Takuma Nishimura of Sendai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oita make their third substitution with Daiki Watari replacing Ryosuke Maeda.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Kazushi Mitsuhira with Toshio Shimakawa.
The away team replace Kohei Isa with Kei Chinen.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Sendai are pushing forward but Shun Nagasawa's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 70, Sendai drive upfield and Takuma Nishimura gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oita defender.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Goal kick for Oita at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 75, Oita's Kei Chinen misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Kunimitsu Sekiguchi (Sendai) gets a yellow card.
Oita drives forward and Kei Chinen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Oita's Tatsuya Tanaka is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Oita at Yurtec Stadium.
Yuta Koide is on a sub for Yamato Machida for Oita.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Goal! Oita extend their lead to 0-2 through Kei Chinen.
In the minute 80, Yuta Koide with an assist there.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
In the minute 83, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 85, Oita take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Tatsuya Tanaka.
Kei Chinen instrumental with a fine assist.
Shogo Nakahara is replacing Takuma Hamasaki for the home team.
In the minute 88, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Oita.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sendai.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oita takes a corner from the right.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Oita make their fifth substitution with Koki Kotegawa replacing Kento Haneda.
